q: Downing Street's indication that Andy Coulson will not be receiving severance pay is in line with the standard contract for special advisers, it said. The contract, drawn up in June, reads: Because of the power of the Crown to dismiss at will, you are not entitled to a period of notice terminating your employment. However, unless your employment is terminated by agreement, results from... disciplinary proceedings, inefficiency or grounds justifying summary dismissal at common law, you will in practice normally be given not less than three months' notice in writing terminating your employment. On the expiration of such notice, your employment will terminate. 66% of ComRes respondents thought PM should not have hired Andy Coulson knowing he had resigned as NoW editor over phone-hacking scandal. Saying his "heart was in Indiana," Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.

Jane Lynch , the 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with

Of course the millions of Michael Vick fans and the Michael Vick family are excited about his( Dallas) honor, Tina Michael Vick said. "But we have so many development projects here, that's really not our focus." Michael Vick is not the nation's first controversial recipient of an enormous honorary key.

Had Colin Powell not stood in the way, in Donald Rumsfeld 's view, the President Bush administration might have gained conclusive evidence that Iraq had an active WMD site. As expected, shortly after Colin Powell 's speech was delivered, many of the terrorists fled Khurmal, he wrote.
